tool_description: Executes email campaigns by sending personalized messages to donor segments with delivery tracking, bounce handling, and engagement monitoring.

campaign_id.description: Unique identifier for the email campaign

send_immediately.description: Whether to send immediately or use scheduled time

error_messages: Invalid campaign ID: The specified campaign_id does not exist or is not accessible.
Empty recipient list: recipient_list must contain at least one valid email address.
Invalid email format: One or more email addresses in recipient_list or sender_email are improperly formatted.
Subject line required: subject_line cannot be empty or exceed 150 characters.
Scheduling conflict: scheduled_time must be in the future when send_immediately is false.
Send quota exceeded: The recipient_list exceeds your current sending limits.
usage: Provide campaign_id, recipient_list, subject_line, and sender_email. Set send_immediately to true for immediate delivery or provide scheduled_time for delayed sending. Optionally configure tracking options.

send_status.description: Overall campaign send status: completed, partial, failed, or scheduled

tracking_enabled.description: Whether tracking is active for this campaign
